column2: "Ah, is that you? It is you, isn't it? Lisa's so glad to see you!"

"So glad that Lisa could've shot you!
...Okay, Lisa's just kidding."
"Oh by the way, have you been to one yet? One of those inexplicably corrupted places? Lisa won't let you say that you haven't been to one, you know?"
"To ARKS, they're classified as \"quarantined areas\". You know, those!"
"Those are amazing. How mysterious! Lisa didn't think they would be so exciting."
"To be honest, those areas feel waaay more risky than that [Double] everyone's been talking about, you know?"
"Hm? What's so risky about them? Don't ask Lisa. Lisa just gets that feeling."
"Like, Planet Harkotan is in chaos because of [Double]'s invasion. That situation was, obviously, caused by [Double]."
"Then then then, what exactly caused those inexplicably corrupted areas?"
"Was it a Darker invasion? A natural disaster? Or was it something else entirely? Nobody knows what's what."
"...Although, perhaps there are people who have some sort of idea?"
"Well, as far as Lisa is concerned, those places are perfect for an all-you-can-shoot killing spree."
"Lisa doesn't really care about the how's, why's, and all the other small details like that."
"Lisa's happy as long as she has bad guys to shoot. Hehehe. Hehehehe!"
